explorer.fileNesting.patterns.package.json: package-lock.json, pnpm*, .yarnrc*, yarn*, bun.lock, tsconfig.json, .eslint*, eslint*, biome.json, .oxlint*, oxlint*, .prettier*,  prettier*, .editorconfig, .npmrc, drizzle.config.ts, auth-schema.ts
